installCommand: git lfs install && REMOTE_URL=$(git remote get-url origin 2>/dev/null || echo 'https://github.com/mcapace/deutsch-hub.git') && git config lfs.url ${REMOTE_URL%/}.git/info/lfs && (git lfs pull || echo 'LFS pull failed, continuing...') && npm install
buildCommand: (git lfs pull || echo 'LFS pull failed, continuing build...') && npm run build
